title: UTF vs. PKO
text:
Starting to feel a little dubious about the longer term prospectives with PIMCO and the leveraged "paper" funds. Because of how PIMCO has handled recent events and their questionnable explanations (see other threads), I have left PIMIX for BCOIX, which I now view as more reliable (though not as well paying).

When it comes to PKO, I am wondering whether it is time to get out of the leveraged paper fund and go with something a bit more tangible, hence UFI. It means a dip in income but I am thinking there might be a little less risk with a fund that is a bit more transparent.

I will stay with PKO's outspring PCI for now and watch it closely.

Thoughts??
